tagline: Huerray brings creators and brands together to create the perfect content for social media, ecommerce, ads and more

hero.title: Authentic UGC Video Content that Converts
hero.subtitle: Collaborate with real vetted creators who make scroll-stopping videos for TikTok, Reels, and Ads
hero.description:
No Subscriptions. No Platform costs.
Just UGC that drives sales

step1.title: Find & connect with creators who fit your brand
step1.description: Customise and post your brief, tailoring the details such as length, format and video editing along the way

step2.title: Commission attractive, original photos & videos
step2.description: Receive applications from top creators. Select your preferred creators according to criteria that fits your brand content or campaign requirements

step3.title: Send & receive feedback
step3.description: Use the in-built communication feature to exchange feedback with your creators, ask them questions about their deliverables, make adjustments where needed or refine your requirements

step4.title: 100% licensing rights to all content created
step4.description: Use your generated content. Your UGC will be delivered within 7 days. You can then start implementing it into your campaign

contentObjectives.title: Content for every objective
contentObjectives.subtitle: Creators produce high-quality content all the timeâ€”from lo-fi to hi-fi. Creators have range, and adapt their production to match your goals

testimonial.quote: We immediately published the first ad variations with Billo's recommended structure, we didn't edit anything, and it already worked better than our previous ads. Our ROAS was better and acquisition costs went down. We were able to scale larger because of that.
testimonial.author: Jorens, CEO

creatorsSection.label: Creators
creatorsSection.title: Get paid to do what you love
creatorsSection.description: Find collaborations that gets you excited. Work with brands that fit your content style, with special autonomy over every campaign your produce
